title: Investigation of biochars derived from waste lignocellulosic biomass and insulation electric cables: A comprehensive TGA and Macro-TGA analysis
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Roberta Panizio, Carlos Castro, Nuno Pacheco, Ana Carolina Assis, Andrei Longo, Cândida Vilarinho, José Carlos Teixeira, Paulo Brito, Margarida Gonçalves, Catarina Nobre
